amendment.description: Amendment funds fund Section 7101 of the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act at the authorized level to establish Regional Centers of Excellence in Substance Use Disorder Education.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to fund Section 7101 of the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act at the authorized level to establish Regional Centers of Excellence in Substance Use Disorder Education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (OH) amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 408 - 15 (Roll no. 277).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (OH) amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 408 - 15 (Roll no. 277).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Johnson (OH).
